trans-unit.source: Serves as the base class for controls that reside in <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase"></xref> zones and are used to edit <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> controls.
trans-unit.target: Fungerer som basisklassen for kontroller som befinner seg i <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase"> </xref> soner og brukes til å redigere <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> kontroller.

trans-unit.source: The EditorPart class provides a base set of properties and methods that are used by the derived EditorPart controls provided with the Web Parts control set, and by custom EditorPart controls.
trans-unit.target: Klassen EditorPart inneholder et grunnleggende sett med egenskaper og metoder som brukes ved avledede EditorPart kontrollene gav webdeler kontrollsett, og egendefinerte EditorPart-kontroller.

trans-unit.source: An EditorPart control allows a user to edit an associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control by modifying its layout, appearance, properties, behavior, or other characteristics.
trans-unit.target: En kontroll som EditorPart kan brukeren til å redigere en tilknyttet <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>kontroll ved å endre oppsettet, utseendet, egenskaper, virkemåte eller andre egenskaper.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: The editing user interface (UI), which consists of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase> zones that contain EditorPart controls, is displayed after a Web page enters edit mode.
trans-unit.target: Redigering brukergrensesnittet (UI), som består av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase>soner som inneholder EditorPart kontroller vises etter en webside går inn i redigeringsmodus.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > An EditorPart control can be used only within a zone that derives from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase> class, such as the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZone> control.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > En EditorPart kontrollen kan brukes bare i en sone som er avledet fra den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase>class, for eksempel den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZone>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZone> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase>

trans-unit.source: After a page has entered edit mode, a user can select a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control to edit by clicking an edit verb on the verbs menu of the selected control.
trans-unit.target: Når en side har angitt redigeringsmodus, en bruker kan velge en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>kontrollen å redigere en Rediger verb på verb-menyen i den valgte kontrollen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: Only one <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control can be edited at a time.
trans-unit.target: Bare én <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>kontrollen kan redigeres om gangen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: Several derived EditorPart controls are provided with the Web Parts control set, as listed in the following table.
trans-unit.target: Flere avledede EditorPart kontroller leveres med webdeler kontrollen settet som er oppført i tabellen nedenfor.

trans-unit.source: These controls provide all the editing capabilities that are necessary for most applications.
trans-unit.target: Disse kontroller gir alle redigering funksjoner som er nødvendige for de fleste programmer.

trans-unit.source: The typical approach for using these controls in a Web Parts page is to declare them in page persistence format within a `<zonetemplate>` element, where `<zonetemplate>` is the child element of an `<asp:editorzone>` element.
trans-unit.target: Den vanlige fremgangsmåten for å bruke disse kontroller i en webdeler side er å deklarere dem på sider utholdenhet i en `<zonetemplate>` element, der `<zonetemplate>` er det underordnede elementet for en `<asp:editorzone>` elementet.

trans-unit.source: For a code example, see the Example section of this topic.
trans-unit.target: Et kodeeksempel i avsnittet eksempel i dette emnet.

trans-unit.source: |Type of control|Description| |---------------------|-----------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.AppearanceEditorPart>|Edits the appearance of the associated control, including properties such as its title text, height, width, and border attributes.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.BehaviorEditorPart>|Edits certain behaviors of the associated control, such as whether it can be edited, whether it can be closed, or whether it can be moved to another zone.
trans-unit.target: | Kontrolltypen | Beskrivelse | |---------------------|-----------------| | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.AppearanceEditorPart>| Redigerer utseendet til den tilknyttede kontrollen, inkludert egenskaper som titteltekst, høyde, bredde og kantlinjeattributter. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.BehaviorEditorPart>| Redigerer bestemte virkemåter kontrollens tilknyttede, for eksempel om kan redigeres, om den kan lukkes eller om den kan flyttes til en annen sone.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.BehaviorEditorPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.AppearanceEditorPart>

trans-unit.source: This control is only visible on a page when a control is being edited in shared personalization scope.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart>|Edits layout attributes for the associated control, such as whether it is in a normal or minimized (collapsed) state, and what zone it is placed in.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PropertyGridEditorPart>|Edits properties of the associated control, if those properties were declared in the source code with a `WebBrowsable` attribute.| > [!NOTE] > To improve accessibility, all the EditorPart controls provided in the Web Parts control set are rendered within a `<fieldset>` element.
trans-unit.target: Denne kontrollen vises bare på en side når en kontroll blir redigert i delt område. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart>| Redigeringer oppsettet attributtene for den tilknyttede kontrollen, for eksempel om det er en vanlig eller minimert (skjult) tilstand, og hva sone den er plassert i. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PropertyGridEditorPart>| Redigerer egenskapene for den tilknyttede kontrollen hvis disse egenskapene ble deklarert i kildekode med en `WebBrowsable` attributtet. | > [!NOTE] > For å forbedre tilgjengelighet, kontrollerer alle EditorPart angitt i webdeler gjengis kontrollsett i et `<fieldset>` element.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PropertyGridEditorPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart>

trans-unit.source: The `<fieldset>` element groups the related set of controls used for editing in a given EditorPart control, and it facilitates tabbed navigation among those controls for both visual user agents (such as ordinary Web browsers) and speech-oriented user agents (such as screen-reading software).
trans-unit.target: Den `<fieldset>` elementet grupperer relaterte settet med kontroller som brukes til å redigere i en gitt EditorPart kontroll, og den muliggjør følgende navigasjon blant kontrollene for både visual brukeragenter (for eksempel vanlig nettlesere) og tale orientert brukeragenter (for eksempel programvare).

trans-unit.source: Initializes the class for use by an inherited class instance.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer klasse for bruk av en arvet klasse-forekomst.

trans-unit.source: This constructor can be called only by an inherited class.
trans-unit.target: Denne konstruktøren kan bare kalles av en arvet klasse.

trans-unit.source: Saves the values in an <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart"></xref> control to the corresponding properties in the associated <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Lagrer verdier i en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart"> </xref> kontrollen til de tilsvarende egenskapene i den tilknyttede <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The ApplyChanges method is a critical method on an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> control.
trans-unit.target: Metoden ApplyChanges er en kritisk metode på en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>

trans-unit.source: It is defined as an abstract method in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> class, and must be implemented by inherited controls.
trans-unit.target: Den er definert som en abstrakt metode i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>klasse, og må implementeres av arvede kontroller.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>

trans-unit.source: The method's purpose is to save the values a user has entered into an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> control to the corresponding properties in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control that is referenced in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.WebPartToEdit%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Den metoden formålet er å lagre verdier som en bruker er angitt i en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>kontrollen til de tilsvarende egenskapene i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>kontroll som det refereres til i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.WebPartToEdit%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.WebPartToEdit%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>

trans-unit.source: The ApplyChanges method is called when the user clicks a button representing an OK or an apply verb in the editing user interface (UI).
trans-unit.target: Metoden ApplyChanges kalles når brukeren klikker en som representerer en OK eller et Bruk verb i redigering brukergrensesnittet (UI).

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the action of saving values from the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart"></xref> control to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> control is successful; otherwise (if an error occurs), <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis handlingen lagring verdier fra det <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart"> </xref> styre til den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> kontrollen er vellykket; ellers (Hvis det oppstår en feil), <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether a control should be displayed when its associated <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> control is in edit mode.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om en kontroll skal vises når de tilknyttede <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> kontrollen er i redigeringsmodus.

trans-unit.source: At certain points in the editing process, the zone that contains an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> control checks the Display property to determine whether to display the control.
trans-unit.target: På bestemte punkt i redigering behandle, sonen som inneholder en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>kontrollen kontrollerer egenskapen visning for å finne ut om du vil vise kontrollen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>

trans-unit.source: There are two scenarios where the Display property returns `false` and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> control is not displayed.
trans-unit.target: Det finnes to scenarioer der egenskapen Vis returnerer `false` og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>kontrollen ikke vises.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>

trans-unit.source: The first scenario occurs when the control being edited is a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPart> control.
trans-unit.target: Det første scenarioet oppstår når kontrollen redigeres en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPart>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPart>

trans-unit.source: The second scenario occurs when the control being edited has its <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AllowEdit%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.IsShared%2A> properties set to `true`, while the page's personalization scope is set at user level.
trans-unit.target: Det andre scenariet oppstår når kontrollen redigeres har den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AllowEdit%2A>og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.IsShared%2A>egenskapene til `true`under sidens personlige data er angitt på brukernivå.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.IsShared%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AllowEdit%2A>

trans-unit.source: A Boolean value that indicates whether the control should be displayed.
trans-unit.target: En boolsk verdi som angir om kontrollen skal vises.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a string that contains the title text displayed in the title bar of an <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Henter en streng som inneholder tittelteksten vises i tittellinjen i en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The DisplayTitle property returns either the current value of the base <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part.Title%2A> property or, if the control has no title, a calculated value.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen DisplayTitle returnerer gjeldende verdi for grunntallet <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part.Title%2A>egenskapen eller, hvis kontrollen har ingen tittel, en beregnet verdi.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part.Title%2A>

trans-unit.source: The calculated value consists of a localizable resource string for untitled controls.
trans-unit.target: Den beregnede verdien består av en lokaliserbare ressursstrengen for uten navn kontroller.

trans-unit.source: In the cases where no value is assigned to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part.Title%2A> property, the value of the DisplayTitle property differs from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part.Title%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: I tilfeller der ingen verdi er tilordnet til den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part.Title%2A>egenskapen verdien for egenskapen DisplayTitle er forskjellig fra den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part.Title%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part.Title%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part.Title%2A>

trans-unit.source: Because the DisplayTitle property is designed to be a read-only, calculated property to get the actual current value of the displayed title at run time, do not attempt to use this property to set a title for an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> control.
trans-unit.target: Fordi egenskapen DisplayTitle er utformet for å være en skrivebeskyttet, beregnet til å hente den faktiske verdien for gjeldende for vises ved kjøretid, ikke forsøk å bruke denne egenskapen til å angi en tittel for en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>

trans-unit.source: To set a title, use the base <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part.Title%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil angi en tittel, kan du bruke grunntallet <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part.Title%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part.Title%2A>

trans-unit.source: A string that represents the complete, visible title of the control.
trans-unit.target: En streng som representerer fullført, vises tittelen på kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The default value is a calculated, culture-specific string supplied by the .NET Framework.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er en beregnet, kultur-spesifikke streng ble levert av .NET Framework.

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the current state of an <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart"></xref> control's parent zone.
trans-unit.target: Henter gjeldende status for en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart"> </xref> kontrollens overordnede sone.

trans-unit.source: The GetDesignModeState method returns information about the state of the zone that contains an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> control.
trans-unit.target: Metoden GetDesignModeState returnerer informasjon om tilstanden til sonen som inneholder en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>

trans-unit.source: The state information is returned in the form of a dictionary.
trans-unit.target: Tilstandsinformasjonen returneres i form av en ordliste.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> that has the current state of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase"></xref> zone that contains an <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>som har den gjeldende tilstanden til den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase"> </xref> sone som inneholder en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart"> </xref> kontroll.</xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Control.PreRender"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Hever den <xref href="System.Web.UI.Control.PreRender"> </xref> hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: In addition to calling the base <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.OnPreRender%2A> method, the OnPreRender method also checks the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.Display%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: I tillegg til kaller grunntallet <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.OnPreRender%2A>kontrollerer også metoden metoden OnPreRender den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.Display%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.Display%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Control.OnPreRender%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the value is `false`, meaning that the control should not be displayed, then the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Visible%2A> property is also set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: Hvis verdien er `false`, noe som betyr at kontrollen ikke skal vises, og deretter den <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Visible%2A>også settes til `false`.</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Visible%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.EventArgs>som inneholder Hendelsesdata.</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase"></xref> that contains the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart"></xref> control is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase"> </xref> som inneholder den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart"> </xref> kontrollen er <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Applies the characteristics of the design-mode state to the current <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase"></xref> zone that contains an <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapene til tilstanden utformingsmodus gjelder gjeldende <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase"> </xref> sone som inneholder en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> that contains state data for displaying the zone.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>som inneholder dataene for å vise sonen.</xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the property values from a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> control for its associated <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Henter egenskapsverdier fra en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> kontroll for den tilknyttede <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The SyncChanges method is a critical method on an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> control.
trans-unit.target: Metoden SyncChanges er en kritisk metode på en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>

trans-unit.source: It is defined as an abstract method in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> class, and must be implemented by inherited controls.
trans-unit.target: Den er definert som en abstrakt metode i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>klasse, og må implementeres av arvede kontroller.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>

trans-unit.source: The purpose of the method is to retrieve the current values from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control referenced in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.WebPartToEdit%2A> property, and update the fields in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> control with those values so a user can edit them.
trans-unit.target: Formålet med metoden er ikke hente gjeldende verdier fra det <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>kontrollen som det refereres til i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.WebPartToEdit%2A>egenskapen og oppdatering av feltene i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>kontroll med verdiene slik at en bruker kan redigeres.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.WebPartToEdit%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: The SyncChanges method is called whenever the values in the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control might have changed.
trans-unit.target: Metoden SyncChanges kalles når verdiene i den tilknyttede <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>kontrollen kan ha endret.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: For every <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> control, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase> zone that contains the control calls the SyncChanges method immediately after calling the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.ApplyChanges%2A> method, so that the values in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> control are always synchronized with the values in the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control.
trans-unit.target: For hver <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>kontroll, den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase>sone som inneholder kontrollen kaller metoden SyncChanges umiddelbart etter kall av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.ApplyChanges%2A>metode, slik at verdiene i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>kontrollen er alltid synkronisert med verdiene i den tilknyttede <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.ApplyChanges%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>

trans-unit.source: Another case where the SyncChanges method is called is when a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control is entering edit mode.
trans-unit.target: En annen tilfeller der metoden SyncChanges kalles er når en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>kontrollen går inn i redigeringsmodus.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The SyncChanges method is not called after the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.ApplyChanges%2A> method if that method returns `false`, because in that case, an error has occurred.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > For SyncChanges metoden ikke kalles etter den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.ApplyChanges%2A>metoden hvis denne metoden returnerer `false`fordi i så fall det oppstod en feil.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.ApplyChanges%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"></xref> control associated with the current Web page.
trans-unit.target: Henter en referanse til det <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"> </xref> kontrollen som er knyttet til den gjeldende websiden.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> control needs a reference to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> instance because it must check the current personalization scope of the page to determine the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.Display%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>kontrollen krever en referanse til det <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>serverforekomsten fordi det må kontrollere gjeldende område på siden for å bestemme verdien for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.Display%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.Display%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>

trans-unit.source: Personalization scope is determined by checking the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.Scope%2A> property, which is accessed through the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.Personalization%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Område avgjøres av kontroll av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.Scope%2A>-egenskapen som er tilgjengelig via den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.Personalization%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.Personalization%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.Scope%2A>

trans-unit.source: A reference to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"></xref> on the page.
trans-unit.target: En referanse til det <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"> </xref> på siden.

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> control that is currently being edited.
trans-unit.target: Henter en referanse til det <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> kontroll som redigeres.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control (or other server or user control) that is currently being edited corresponds to the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.SelectedWebPart%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>kontrollen (eller en annen server eller bruker kontroll) som er for øyeblikket redigeres samsvarer med verdien for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.SelectedWebPart%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.SelectedWebPart%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: Only one <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control can be edited at a time, and when a control is in edit mode, the WebPartToEdit property provides a reference to that control.
trans-unit.target: Bare én <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>kontrollen kan redigeres om gangen, og når det er en kontroll i redigeringsmodus, egenskapen WebPartToEdit inneholder en referanse til kontrollen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: After the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase> zone has added the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> control to its collection of controls, it then assigns the value of its own <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase.WebPartToEdit%2A> property to the WebPartToEdit property on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> control.
trans-unit.target: Etter den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase>sone er lagt til i <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>kontrollen samlingen av kontroller tilordner den deretter verdien for sine egne <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase.WebPartToEdit%2A>egenskapen egenskapen WebPartToEdit den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase.WebPartToEdit%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> control uses the WebPartToEdit property especially in its two critical methods--<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.ApplyChanges%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.SyncChanges%2A>--to get and set the property values on the associated control.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>kontrollen bruker egenskapen WebPartToEdit spesielt i de to kritiske metodene--<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.ApplyChanges%2A> og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.SyncChanges%2A>--hente og angi egenskapsverdiene for den tilknyttede kontrollen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.SyncChanges%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.ApplyChanges%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> that is currently in edit mode.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> som er i redigeringsmodus.

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase"></xref> zone that contains an <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Henter en referanse til det <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase"> </xref> sone som inneholder en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Although the Zone property is read-only, it provides a reference to the zone object that contains the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> control, and you can programmatically change property values on the zone itself.
trans-unit.target: Selv om Zone-egenskapen er skrivebeskyttet, den inneholder en referanse til zone-objektet som inneholder den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>kontrollen, og du kan endre egenskapsverdier for sonen selve programmatisk.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase"></xref> that contains the control.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase"> </xref> som inneholder kontrollen.
